original_title: 「詐欺パパに騙されて集団にタダマン輪姦されてサイアク〜!」「就職\?夢\?将来\?どうでもよくなってきちゃったw」「ねぇ…おじさん…もっと中に出して下さい…。」 青空ひかり
overview: Hikari, who moved out of the countryside and lives alone in Tokyo, makes ends meet by sending money and working part-time, but due to an epidemic of an infectious disease... Her future job hunting and financial problems aren't going well, so she entrusts her hopes to daddy activities... . A JD who fell into a dad scam is a free man ring! ! A beautiful female college student who is being raped by starving beast dads. "It just got better..."
title: “Worst Case Scenario When A Swindling Step-dad Tricks Her Into Giving Her Pussy Up For Group Sex!” “Get A Job? My Dream? My Future? I Don’t Care Whatever It Is.” “Hey… Mister… Will You Cum In Me More, Please…” Hikari Aozora
